about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I am a junior mobile developer with over two years of professional experience in IT support and systems maintenance. I previously worked at Leader Group, where I handled hardware, networking, and database systems for both cashier (Frontline) and back-office (Backline) operations. I also supported large-scale retail systems across multiple companies, including Leader Hypermarket Lda, Leader Mart Lda, CEMET Timor SA, Auto Timor Leste Lda, and Lisun Timor Lda.
about.paragraph2: Currently, I am working as an IT Collaborator at Viettel Timor Unipessoal, LDA (TELEMOR), one of the leading telecommunications companies in Timor-Leste. I am part of the IT Unit, specifically in the Software Development department, where I have been working for the past four months. I am grateful for this opportunity and motivated to continue growing as a mobile developer.
